Text.Page:
Have you noticed how disturbed the argons' creatures are by the faerie saplings? I think faerie magic is poisonous to them in some way. Do you suppose that's why the argons tried to destroy Seeliewood?

I'm really afraid the {@LinkCreature:47#2003#contaminated gulas} are going to uproot them. Maybe you'd like to uproot the gulas first. Then check in with Rozaline at {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station}.
Fewer gulas means more trees. good job, <PCNAME>. Stick around and we'll put you to work right enough.
